update.description:
Language updates.
Fix SF 3000712 - Spike in Traffic graphs after reboot.
Upgrade acpid to 2.0.9, apache httpd to 2.2.19, bash to 4.2.10, bind to 9.7.3-P1, coreutils to 8.12, dejavu-fonts to 2.33, dhcpcd to 5.2.12, freetype to 2.4.6, gawk to 4.0.0, grep to 2.9, hdparm to 9.37, iproute2 to 2.6.39, iptables to 1.4.12, iptstate to 2.2.3, iw to 0.9.22, kernel to 2.6.32.45, less to 444, libnet to 1.1.5, libcap to 2.22, libpng to 1.5.4, linux-atm-2.5.2 patched, logrotate to 3.8.0, mdadm to 3.1.5, openssh to 5.8p2, openswan to 2.6.35, openvpn to 2.2.1, pango to 1.28.4, parted to 3.0, pcmciautils to 018, procps-3.2.8 patched, squid to 3.1.14, squid-langpack to 20110718, tzdata to 2011h, traceroute to 2.0.17, usb-modeswitch to 1.1.8, usbutils to 003, vnstat to 1.11. Compile gnupg with stackprotector.
Mandatory reboot after upgrade.
